CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Ageing_SDR_Req_sub_date_to_SDR_release__c ), NULL, IF( Ageing_SDR_Req_sub_date_to_SDR_release__c <= 3, "0–3 Days", IF( Ageing_SDR_Req_sub_date_to_SDR_release__c <= 5, "3–5 Days", IF( Ageing_SDR_Req_sub_date_to_SDR_release__c <= 7, "6–7 Days", ">7 Days" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: SDR Release Ageing Bucket
